x_nuta2_nutanix_ca_nutanix_marketplaceit.author: Nutanix
x_nuta2_nutanix_ca_nutanix_marketplaceit.description:
Veeam速 Backup for Nutanix AHV provides availability and data protection for all applications and AHV VMs running on Nutanix. Veeam速 Backup for Nutanix AHV utilizes a virtual proxy appliance deployed on an AHV cluster. The recommended deployment, management, and upgrade of existing Proxy appliances is easily handled from any Veeam Backup and Replication v10 server with the Veeam Backup for Nutanix AHV package install on it. The proxy image provided here is capable of being utilized as a standalone AHV snapshot manager with snapshot restore functionality if no Veeam Backup and Replication server is present or connected to an existing Veeam backup server for centralized management. The Veeam Backup & Replication v10 server provides centralized license management. At the same time, it grants access to repositories for backup operations as well as VM disk, file-level, and application-item restores for mission-critical applications to VMware, Microsoft Azure, AWS or directly to an AHV Cluster.

License:
  • 30-day FREE trial
Hardware Requirement:
  • CPU: x86-64 processors. 4 CPU cores plus 1 CPU core for each additional concurrent task
  • Memory: 4 GB RAM plus 1 GB RAM for each additional concurrent task.
Platform:
  • Nutanix AHV versions 5.5.x up to 5.16.x
  • CE 2019.11.22 or later for Community Edition
Support Information:
  • Website:Veeam Support
Other Instructions:
  • Open ports 8100,9440,10006,3260,2500-3300,8543
x_nuta2_nutanix_ca_nutanix_marketplaceit.description_markdown:
Veeam速 Backup for Nutanix AHV provides availability and data protection for all applications and AHV VMs running on Nutanix. Veeam速 Backup for Nutanix AHV utilizes a virtual proxy appliance deployed on an AHV cluster. The recommended deployment, management, and upgrade of existing Proxy appliances is easily handled from any Veeam Backup and Replication v10 server with the Veeam Backup for Nutanix AHV package install on it. The proxy image provided here is capable of being utilized as a standalone AHV snapshot manager with snapshot restore functionality if no Veeam Backup and Replication server is present or connected to an existing Veeam backup server for centralized management. The Veeam Backup & Replication v10 server provides centralized license management. At the same time, it grants access to repositories for backup operations as well as VM disk, file-level, and application-item restores for mission-critical applications to VMware, Microsoft Azure, AWS or directly to an AHV Cluster.
#### License: * [30-day FREE trial](https://www.veeam.com/availability-nutanix-ahv-download.html) #### Hardware Requirement: * CPU: x86-64 processors. 4 CPU cores plus 1 CPU core for each additional concurrent task * Memory: 4 GB RAM plus 1 GB RAM for each additional concurrent task. #### Platform: * Nutanix AHV versions 5.5.x up to 5.16.x * CE 2019.11.22 or later for Community Edition #### Support Information: * Website:[Veeam Support](https://www.veeam.com/support.html) #### Other Instructions: * Open ports `8100`,`9440`,`10006`,`3260`,`2500-3300`,`8543`
